import React from "react"; import { formatCount } from "../utils/formatCount"; import { formatDate } from "../utils/formatDate"; import { Card, Button, Row, Col, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; const PostHeader = ({ post, likeCount, handleLike, userId, handleDeletePost, handleEditPost }) => { const profileImageUrl = post.profile_image; const postImageUrl = post.post_image; return ( {userId === post.user_id && (
)}
{post.nickname}
{formatDate(post.create_at)} {post.post_title} {postImageUrl && (
)} {post.post_content}
{likeCount}
좋아요
{formatCount(post.view_count)}
조회수
{formatCount(post.comment_count)}
댓글
 ); }; export default PostHeader;
